256270.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Blacklist - Homeland DLC
256270.description:
As leader of the newly formed 4th Echelon, Sam Fisher must hunt down merciless terrorists before The Blacklist countdown reaches zero. The Splinter Cell Blacklist DLC 2 contains all the essential items for fans to become Sam Fisher and stop the escalating Blacklist attacks.

  • Single Player and Coop Maps: Dead Coast & Billionaire's Yacht
  • 4 Gear pieces
  • 4 suits
  • 1 weapon
256270.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 繁体中文, 俄语*, 日语*, 波兰语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 挪威语, 瑞典语, 匈牙利语, 捷克语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
